title: The Photographers
creator_credit: Christine Huneke, Time-Life Films and Jerry Sims
brief_description: Five of America’s top professional still photographers are seen here on assignments around the world. Includes Larry Burrows, Alfred Eisenstaedt, Mary Ellen Mark, John Dominis and Norman Parkinson.
